Text:
This is a great play by a French author, Jean Anouillh made to a film. King Henry II of England makes his friend Thomas Becket Archbishop of Canterbury. But when the King tries to diminish the privileges of the English Church, the King understands that Becket will defend "the honour of God" at any cost. A fine plot, good actors and an excellent film.

Towa e prekasna piesa na frenskija pisatel Zhan Anui, naprawena na film. Kral Henri II Anglijski izdiga prijatelja si Tomas Beket za Arhiepiskop na Kentyrbyri. No kogato posjaga na priwilegiite na anglijskata Tzyrkwa, kraljat razbira, che Beket shte zashtiti "Bozhijata chest" na wsjaa tzena. Dobyr sjuzhet, chudesni artisti i newerojaten film.
